channel.title: Birdpod - Birdwatching Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to all you Birdwatchers, Birders, Twitchers, Scopers, Ornithologists, Bird Nerds and Nature Lovers out there - Here you can listen to my weekly podcasts where I discuss all things Bird-related, plus YOU have the chance to have your say too!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Weekly Birdwatching Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Neil Baxter
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to all you Birdwatchers, Birders, Twitchers, Scopers, Ornithologists, Bird Nerds and Nature Lovers out there - Here you can listen to my weekly podcasts where I discuss all things Bird-related, plus YOU have the chance to have your say too!

item.title: 26th July, 2009 - "White-tailed Eagle"
item.description: Birdpod's back after a short absence (sorry folks) - the artificial bird for this episode - the White-tailed Eagle! Plus of course, Birdping News.
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: Birdpod's back after a short absence (sorry folks) - the artificial bird for this episode - the White-tailed Eagle! Plus of course, Birdping News.

item.title: 5th July, 2009 - "Live from South Stack, Anglesey"
item.description: A return trip to this lovely place whilst on a day off work. Find out what I saw by tuning in! Also of course, Birding News and Artificial Bird Of The Week!
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: A return trip to this lovely place whilst on a day off work. Find out what I saw by tuning in! Also of course, Birding News and Artificial Bird Of The Week!

item.title: 28th June, 2009 - "Give me a call"
item.description: "Trying to reverse the charges? Accept 'em? NO WAY!!!" No... it's not that kind of call... all about the sounds we hear from our avian chums that let us know they're there even when we can't see them. Plus of course, as always, "Birding News" and "Artificial Bird Of The Week"
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: "Trying to reverse the charges? Accept 'em? NO WAY!!!" No... it's not that kind of call... all about the sounds we hear from our avian chums that let us know they're there even when we can't see them. Plus of course, as always, "Birding News" and "Artificial Bird Of The Week"

item.title: 21st June, 2009 - "Oh look - A Heron!"
item.description: Sorry for the bland and rather straightforward title... I wanted a pretty snappy title with great wordplay... I tried variations on 'error', 'hell and', 'herring', 'hearing', 'errand' - but nothing! ZILCH! Ah well - at least there's "Artificial Bird Of The Week" to look forward to! :)
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary:
Sorry for the bland and rather straightforward title... I wanted a pretty snappy title with great wordplay... I tried variations on 'error', 'hell and', 'herring', 'hearing', 'errand' - but nothing! ZILCH!
Ah well - at least there's "Artificial Bird Of The Week" to look forward to! :)

item.title: 14th June, 2009 - "The One With The Waggly Tail!"
item.description: No... not a doggy in a window... it's all about Wagtails! Plus of course, "Artificial Bird Of The Week" - find out which one, by listening in!
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary:
No... not a doggy in a window... it's all about Wagtails!
Plus of course, "Artificial Bird Of The Week" - find out which one, by listening in!

item.title: 7th June, 2009 - "Finch, Chimps and Mushy Bees!"
item.description: That's the punchline to a TERRIBLE joke... I know it kind of defeats the object knowing the punchline, but hear the rest of the joke here... plus of course, don't miss the 'Artificial Bird Of The Week'!
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: That's the punchline to a TERRIBLE joke... I know it kind of defeats the object knowing the punchline, but hear the rest of the joke here... plus of course, don't miss the 'Artificial Bird Of The Week'!

item.title: Birdpod Weekly 31st May, 2009 - "Hello Ducky!"
item.description: You'd be QUACKERS not to listen to this... all about the Mallard! Plus of course "Artificial Bird Of The Week" - bet you can't wait to hear which one it is this week!
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary:
You'd be QUACKERS not to listen to this... all about the Mallard!
Plus of course "Artificial Bird Of The Week" - bet you can't wait to hear which one it is this week!

item.title: Birdpod Weekly 24th May, 2009 - "A Cat Among The Pigeons"
item.description: All about cats vs birds... information on keeping the two separate (at least until both sign a treaty declaring peace). Also as always "Birding News" - Bird-related articles from the internet. AND... not forgetting the "Artificial Bird Of The Week" - this week - the House Sparrow.
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary:
All about cats vs birds... information on keeping the two separate (at least until both sign a treaty declaring peace).
Also as always "Birding News" - Bird-related articles from the internet.
AND... not forgetting the "Artificial Bird Of The Week" - this week - the House Sparrow.

item.title: Birdpod Weekly 17th May, 2009 - "Invasion Of The Starlings!"
item.description: Lock all doors and windows - we're being invaded! Hide in the cellar everyone! Eh? Ah... don't panic... I'm actually putting a good word in for these often maligned critters... find out more!
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: Lock all doors and windows - we're being invaded! Hide in the cellar everyone! Eh? Ah... don't panic... I'm actually putting a good word in for these often maligned critters... find out more!

item.title: Birdpod Weekly 17th January, 2009 - "Why Do You Like Birdwatching?"
item.description: Comments from our listeners on what they enjoy best about this excellent hobby. Plus recent news events in the Birding World, an 'Artificial Blackbird' and news about next week's podcast! Have a listen folks.
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: Comments from our listeners on what they enjoy best about this excellent hobby. Plus recent news events in the Birding World, an 'Artificial Blackbird' and news about next week's podcast! Have a listen folks.

item.title: Birdpod Weekly 12th January, 2009 - "Why I enjoy Birdwatching"
item.description: I'll tell you why I enjoy this hobby - and then YOU have the opportunity to have your say... find out how by listening to this podcast.
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: I'll tell you why I enjoy this hobby - and then YOU have the opportunity to have your say... find out how by listening to this podcast.

item.title: Episode 4 - Twitching
item.description: So what exactly is Twitching? Find out here!
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary: So what exactly is Twitching? Find out here!

item.title: Episode 3 - How I "Got Into" Birdwatching...
item.description: It all started with a Grey Wagtail and some cheap binoculars from Argos. Find out more - have a listen.
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary:
It all started with a Grey Wagtail and some cheap binoculars from Argos.
Find out more - have a listen.

item.title: Episode 2 - The History Of Birdwatching (Spoof)
item.description: A little bit of light relief before the next 'proper' podcast. How did Birdwatching come about? Who decided what to call 'em? Did 'House Sparrows' exist BEFORE houses were built? Find out here...
item.dc:creator: Neil Baxter
item.itunes:summary:
A little bit of light relief before the next 'proper' podcast.
How did Birdwatching come about? Who decided what to call 'em? Did 'House Sparrows' exist BEFORE houses were built? Find out here...
